inspector.description: Tracking the 'Net Call Delta' (Bullish Pressure) vs 'Net Put Delta' (Bearish Pressure). A positive spread indicates institutional positioning for upward momentum.
inspector.sql_logic:
SELECT 
    trade_date,
    ticker,
    SUM(CASE 
        WHEN option_type = 'call' THEN net_delta 
        ELSE -net_delta 
    END) as net_flow_sentiment
FROM silver_options_flow
WHERE ticker IN ('NVDA', 'TSLA')
GROUP BY 1, 2
ORDER BY trade_date ASC;
